entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING ENDED, Port Perry

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 4. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending this morning then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 4. Wind chill near minus 13. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries changing to 70 percent chance of flurries this evening and then to 30 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 12. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 06:44 AM EST Thursday 26 January 2023
